Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

(This has been approved) Everybody, here are some details on how the voting=
 will work:

1) Once I create a voting format sheet to copy&paste and when =
I ask for votes, you'll copy&paste the layout, and then fill in your answer=
s and send them to me(1641coburn@...) .  However, you may also choos=
e to send them to RoboRick, Narrator(Soulstice), or to any of the council.
=

2) To the council, and nWo members:  If for some reason people send their =
votes to you, PLEASE send their votes to me so I can get them.

3) If you w=
ant to vote for a certain thing, but you dislike that char or RPer or just =
wanna protect your ego, DON'T WORRY!  ALL votes will be TOTALLY ANONYMOUS. =
 Yes, that's right, don't be afraid to vote for nWo stuff, nobody will ever=
 find out except for the person you send your votes to.

4) First, everybod=
y can fill out their voting sheets and send them to me to collect, and then=
 I will put everything together and make polls.  Each category's polls will=
 start with one semi-final poll consisting of several options, and then onc=
e those votes come in, the two highest-voted options advance.  So then, eac=
h category will have finals polls with only two options each, with the most=
 voted being the winner of that particular category.

5) Should a tie end u=
p in the finals, certain measures will be taken.  First, if the two options=
 get a tie in votes, an announcement will be made letting everybody know th=
at there's a tie and asking people who haven't voted to vote.  If nobody vo=
tes, then the winner will be decided by which of the two options got the mo=
st votes in the semi-finals.  If their semi-finals votes were ties, then th=
e winner of the two options will be decided by votes from strictly the nWo =
and the council.  If a, highly unlikely, tie is in our votes, then I will r=
andomly choose the winner.

6) NO MULTIPLE VOTING!  I will be keeping track=
 of everybody that votes, so that nobody tries to send in votes twice.

---=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
--------
The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
New World Ord=
er



------=_NextPart_001_0013_01C290DD.464B3020
